trans-unit.source: Move the selected operations to another work center.

seg-source.mrk: Move the selected operations to another work center.

target.mrk: 선택한 작업을 다른 워크 센터로 이동합니다.

trans-unit.source: Level work center utilization by moving one or more order operations to another work center.

seg-source.mrk: Level work center utilization by moving one or more order operations to another work center.

target.mrk: 하나 또는 여러 개의 오더 작업을 다른 워크 센터로 이동하여 워크 센터 이용률을 평준화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Select order operations by marking the checkbox.

seg-source.mrk: Select order operations by marking the checkbox.

trans-unit.source: You can change the work center for order operations that have the processing status <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: You can change the work center for order operations that have the processing status <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 처리 상태가 <uicontrol>예정</uicontrol>인 오더 작업의 워크 센터를 변경할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the work center for an order operation that you've already scheduled, you must reset it first. This changes the operation's processing status back to <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to change the work center for an order operation that you've already scheduled, you must reset it first.
This changes the operation's processing status back to <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 이미 예약한 오더 작업에 대해 워크 센터를 변경하려는 경우 먼저 오더 작업을 재설정해야 합니다.
이렇게 하면 작업 처리 상태가 <uicontrol>예정</uicontrol>으로 돌아갑니다.

trans-unit.source: Click this button and select a work center.

seg-source.mrk: Click this button and select a work center.

target.mrk: 이 버튼을 클릭하고 워크 센터를 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: The drop-down menu includes all work centers that are assigned to you. Once you select a new work center, the utilization forecast is updated automatically.

seg-source.mrk: The drop-down menu includes all work centers that are assigned to you.
Once you select a new work center, the utilization forecast is updated automatically.

target.mrk: 사용자에게 지정된 워크 센터가 모두 포함된 드롭다운 메뉴가 표시됩니다.
신규 워크 센터를 선택하면 이용률 예측이 자동으로 업데이트됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the new work center has order operations that have already been dispatched or are in process and that overlap with the schedule period, these are added automatically to your schedule.

seg-source.mrk: If the new work center has order operations that have already been dispatched or are in process and that overlap with the schedule period, these are added automatically to your schedule.

target.mrk: 신규 워크 센터에 이미 디스패치되었거나 처리 중 상태이고 일정 기간과 겹치는 오더 작업이 있는 경우 이러한 작업은 일정에 자동으로 추가됩니다.

trans-unit.source: After the change, the order operation status changes to <uicontrol>Due (Draft)</uicontrol>. This means that the work center change is only visible in your schedule and is not yet saved in the maintenance order.

seg-source.mrk: After the change, the order operation status changes to <uicontrol>Due (Draft)</uicontrol>.
This means that the work center change is only visible in your schedule and is not yet saved in the maintenance order.

target.mrk: 변경한 후에는 오더 작업의 상태가 <uicontrol>예정(드래프트)</uicontrol>으로 변경됩니다.
즉, 워크 센터 변경은 사용자의 일정에만 표시되고 유지보수 오더에는 아직 저장되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To save the new work center in the order operation, you must schedule and dispatch the operation first.

seg-source.mrk: To save the new work center in the order operation, you must schedule and dispatch the operation first.

target.mrk: 오더 작업에 신규 워크 센터를 저장하려면 먼저 해당 작업의 일정을 계획하고 작업을 디스패치해야 합니다.
